titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on 3,3'-dichlorobenzidine dihydrochloride ([1,1'-biphenyl]-4,4'-diamino, 3,3'-dichloro-).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to decrease temporarily the duty on 3,3 031'-dichlorobenzidine dihydrochloride ([1,1 031'-biphenyl]- 4,4 031'-diamino, 3,3 031'-dichloro-).
